overview_of_class: This course delves deeper into topics students covered in "Introduction to Business Journalism." Students study, write and produce pieces about the latest trends and issues impacting global economies, U.S. and global financial markets, global central bank policies and regulation.
name: Advanced Business Reporting
title: JOUR JOUR 423-2-20 Advanced Business Reporting
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Only students in the MSJ program may enroll in these classes

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course delves deeper into topics students covered in "Introduction to Business Journalism." Students study, write and produce pieces about the latest trends and issues impacting global economies, U.S. and global financial markets, global central bank policies and regulation.
